The Federal Tax Authority is reminding taxpayers to take advantage of the facility to re-determine administrative penalties on tax violations before 31st December, 2022.
This facility allows taxpayers to pay 30 percent of the total outstanding amount of administrative penalties that were not paid before 28th June, 2021.

To be eligible for this facility, taxpayers must settle all due Payable Tax by 31st December, 2022 and pay 30 percent of the total unsettled administrative penalties imposed before 28th June, 2021 no later than 31st December, 2022.
The Authority has provided a detailed explanation on their website regarding the procedure for re-determining administrative penalties.
